    • Match

      public Match(Team local, Team visitor, String date, String time)
      Constructs a Match object with the specified local team, visitor team, date, and time.
      Parameters:
      local - the local team participating in the match
      visitor - the visiting team participating in the match
      date - the date of the match
      time - the time of the match

    • registerResult

      public String registerResult(Player[] scorers, Player[] assistants, String[] scorersMinutes, boolean[] ownGoals, Player[] receivedCardPlayers, int[] cardTypes, String[] cardTimes, Referee[] cardReferees)
      Registers the result of a match by specifying the local and visitor teams, goals, own goals, yellow cards, and red cards.
      Pre: The match must exist.
      Post: The result of the match has been registered.
      Parameters:
      scorers - The players who scored the goals.
      assistants - The players who assisted the goals.
      scorersMinutes - The minutes of the goals.
      ownGoals - Whether the goals were own goals or not.
      yellowCards - The number of yellow cards of each team.
      redCards - The number of red cards of each team.
      Returns:
      A message indicating whether the result was registered successfully.

    • addGoal

      public String addGoal(Player scorer, Player assistant, String minute, boolean ownGoal)
      Adds a goal to the match.
      Pre: The goal must not be null.
      Post: The goal has been added to the match.
      Parameters:
      scorer - The player who scored the goal.
      assistant - The player who assisted the goal.
      minute - The minute of the goal.
      ownGoal - Whether the goal was an own goal or not.
      Returns:
      A message indicating whether the goal was added or not.

    • isPlayed

      public boolean isPlayed()
      Returns whether the match has been played or not.

      true if the match has been played, false otherwise
